summary: Script syntax file for  w3af (Web Application Attack and Audit Framework)
name: W3AF-script-syntax-file
description:
Script syntax file for  w3af (Web Application Attack and Audit Framework)
http://w3af.sourceforge.net/
install_details:
Simply copy it to your ~/.vim/syntax folder and add

" Filetipes
au BufRead,BufNewFile *.w3af		set filetype=w3af

to your ~/.vimrc
